data.meta_description: Buy Newtons Cradle Pendulum Balance Balls With Alloy and Plastic Base For Physics Science Desk Gifts Office Decoration online at wholesale price from Aumni Crafts. | ac-lfstylnaccs-00004-m1
data.text:
Domestic Shipping:

We provide shipping anywhere in India including Cash on Delivery (COD) to most cities. Please allow 1-3 working days for your order to be dispatched after payment confirmation for prepaid orders. Normally for orders placed before 1pm on a business day, we aim to ship the very next day, provided payment is received and stock availability is confirmed. Orders Received on Sunday or during Holidays are dispatched the following Monday or next working day. During busy times, such as holiday periods, there can be processing and shipping delays. Orders to rural domestic addresses may require one or more additional days to deliver.

Typically delivery takes anywhere between 2-5 days based on pincode for domestic express shipments. For economic/low cost domestic shipping options, the delivery timing will be 3-12 days based on pincode. More information can be found using this Dispatch Timing information section about our standard dispatch schedule timings.

International Shipping:

International shipping charges are mentioned on our website. Shipping charges and transit time will vary, depending on the location. All international packages are shipped via DHL / FedEx. All transit times are Monday to Saturday. International delivery cannot be guaranteed within a time frame due to customs.

International delivery time is approximately 5 to 15 days (Based on Geo).

For some shipments delivered outside India, the importing country may charge an import duty/VAT on top of the price of the item. These charges are beyond our control and can’t be reimbursed.

International customers are responsible for any import or customs fees charged by your government. We are unable to predict which shipments will be assessed these fees or the amount of the fee that may be charged. In cases of refusal, either the cost of the goods or return service costs will be assessed.

Tracking: E-mail containing your package tracking information will be sent after shipment. Domestic customers may also receive SMS alerts in addition to e-mail notification about shipment tracking.

Cancellation of Order by User

After placing an order, customer can only cancel the order if the order state is showing as "pending" under Order History. For canceling your order which has been already processed, you will have to get in touch with our Customer Support Team by sending an email giving your Order Number.

In case we receive a cancellation e-mail after your order is dispatched by us, the order cannot be canceled. In any general scenario, Aumni Crafts will try and help with its best to make customer's shopping experience better.

In case of Perishable Goods

In case if a customer wants to cancel the order for a perishable products, the cost of the products will have to be borne by them.

In case of Gift Certificate

Gift Certificate will not be canceled, user can demand for extension of expiry date within 3 days of purchase.

Cancellation of Order by Aumni Crafts

Aumni Crafts reserves the right to refuse or cancel any order placed for a product that is listed at an incorrect price or for any other reason. This shall be regardless of whether the order has been confirmed and/or payment been received. The 100% payment shall be refunded and the User shall be informed of the same.

If a non-delivery or late delivery occurs due to a mistake by the User (i.e. wrong or incomplete name or address or recipient not available or any other related reason) any extra cost spent by Aumni Crafts Shop for re-delivery shall be claimed from the User.

Replacement/ Return Policy by Aumni Crafts

In 7 days except the following:

1. Products perishable in nature

2. Gift Certificates

3. Items that have been opened and used

4. An item not returned in the condition it was received.

5. Any item received by us in a damaged condition.

6. Items sourced or delivered outside India.

7. If the product is not the same as ordered

We take stringent measures to ensure that the items delivered to you are in perfect condition. However, there is a remote possibility that:

• the item may be damaged during transit

• or there might be a manufacturing defect

• or that a wrong item is delivered to you

In only such cases as given above, we will replace the item at no extra cost, provided that the request for replacement / return of item is made within the stipulated time-frame as given below. No returns or replacements will be allowed after the order is processed, except for the reasons given above.

To get a replacement, email us your Order Number and the reason for returning. Only after receiving our confirmation for the return, you are requested to send the item back to us. We will then arrange for the replacement of the item through our logistics partner. We shall not be responsible for any items sent to us for return / replacement without our confirmation.

Our Return Policy:

• Replacement request must be made within 2 days of receiving your order and must not be part of above list

• There are no extra shipping charges for the delivery of replacement items for the reasons mentioned above.

• In case of a replacement, our logistics partners will attempt delivery of the items thrice. In case the delivery is not executed during all the three attempts, due to recipient not available / premises locked, etc., the customer shall still be charged for the order.

• In case of perishable items or custom-made non-perishable items, neither Aumni Crafts nor our enabling partners will be able to accept any returns or replacement of such items.

Refund Policy by Aumni Crafts

Cases of goods unavailability or service problem:

• If the item sent for replacement is not available, we will try to give you best possible alternatives, but at the end, choice of customer will be final

• If the order is confirmed by us and order is not able to ship the product on time, then we give refunds to customer, if customer demands

• 100% refund will be given, if product is not available or if Aumni Crafts is not able to ship the products

Refund Mode and Duration:

For prepaid orders:

For fully paid orders-> The refund will be made to the buyers originally used bank account for purchase from our website. Please allow us 5 business days to credit your bank account with the refund.

For COD orders:

For COD -> Refunds for orders by COD will be made to buyers bank account. Please allow us 7-10 business days to credit your bank account with the refund.
